function setCompleted(uint completed) public restricted {

    last_completed_migration = completed;
vulnerability_findings.message: Migrations.setCompleted (Migrations.sol#18-20) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in Migrations.sol:
	- pragma solidity>=0.4.22<0.8.0 (Migrations.sol#4): is has a complex pragma

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Variable 'Migrations.last_completed_migration' (Migrations.sol#8) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IIncentive.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.6.2 (IIncentive.sol#3): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
MockEthPCVDeposit.deposit (MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#47-51) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(amount) (MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#49)

vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
MockEthPCVDeposit.withdraw (MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#53-57) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(to).transfer(amount) (MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#56)

vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in MockEthPCVDeposit.sol:
	- Version used: ['ABIEncoderV2', '^0.6.0', '^0.6.2']
	- MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.6.2
	- MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#35 declares pragma solidity^0.6.0
	- MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#36 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in MockEthPCVDeposit.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.6.2 (MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.6.0 (MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#35): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_beneficiary' of MockEthPCVDeposit. (MockEthPCVDeposit.sol#43) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: use-nested-if
vulnerability_findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Tribe.getChainId (Tribe.sol#381-386) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
Tribe._writeCheckpoint (Tribe.sol#347-358) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
Tribe.getChainId uses assembly (Tribe.sol#381-386)
	- Tribe.sol#384

vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in Tribe.sol:
	- Version used: ['ABIEncoderV2', '^0.6.0']
	- Tribe.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.6.0
	- Tribe.sol#4 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2
